Package org.anyframe.util.system.sigar

Provides Sigar Accessor utilities to get system (memory, SWAP, CPU, ...), network, file information.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CpuInfo This CpuInfo class is a Value Object class for Cpu information.
FileInfo This FileInfo class is a Value Object class for file information.
FileSystemInfo This FileSystemInfo class is a Value Object class for file system information.
FileSystemUsageInfo This FileSystemUsageInfo class is a Value Object class for file system usage information.
JavaInfo This JavaInfo class is a Value Object class for java information.
MemoryInfo This MemoryInfo class is a Value Object class for memory information.
NativeInfo This NativeInfo class is a Value Object class for native information.
NetworkInfo This NetworkInfo class is a Value Object class for network information.
OsInfo This OsInfo class is a Value Object class for OS information.
ProcessCpuInfo This ProcessCpuInfo class is a Value Object class for process cpu information.
ProcessExeInfo This ProcessExeInfo class is a Value Object class for process execution information.
ProcessInfo This ProcessExeInfo class is a Value Object class for process information.
ProcessMemoryInfo This ProcessMemoryInfo class is a Value Object class for process memory information.
ProcessStateInfo This ProcessStateInfo class is a Value Object class for process state information.
ProcessStatInfo This ProcessStatInfo class is a Value Object class for process status information of system.
SigarAccessor Sigar Accessor Utility Class
Simplifies the initial running environment setting of Sigar that uses JNI library.
SysInfo This SysInfo class is a Value Object class for system information.
UlimitInfo This UlimitInfo class is a Value Object class for ulimit information.
UptimeInfo This UptimeInfo class is a Value Object class for uptime information.
 

Package org.anyframe.util.system.sigar Description

Provides Sigar Accessor utilities to get system (memory, SWAP, CPU, ...), network, file information.

Since:
1.0.0
